title: Summer House Wrap-Up + Jen Richards (CBS' Clarice)
itunes:title: Summer House Wrap-Up + Jen Richards (CBS' Clarice)
itunes:subtitle: Danny wraps up the Summer House season with some thoughts on the 2-part reunion, which featured MULTIPLE walk-offs. Then Danny sits down with one of the stars of CBS' Clarice, trans activist Jen Richards. They discuss her role in the AMAZING docum...
description:
Danny wraps up the Summer House season with some thoughts on the 2-part reunion, which featured MULTIPLE walk-offs. Then Danny sits down with one of the stars of CBS' Clarice, trans activist Jen Richards. They discuss her role in the AMAZING documentary DISCLOSURE (watch on Netflix if you've never seen), Caitlyn Jenner's political run, and the controversial Buffalo Bill legacy from the original Silence of the Lambs.


Jen Richards Interview: 11:26ish

View the Jen interview on YouTube at www.YouTube.com/DannyPellegrino1


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
